patterns.current_pattern: IconButtons typically have title attributes (e.g., title='Edit material') which are NOT accessible to screen readers
patterns.correct_pattern: Add aria-label prop to each IconButton: <IconButton aria-label='Edit material' ...>
patterns.common_button_types: Close buttons, Edit buttons, Delete buttons, More menu buttons, Navigation buttons, Theme toggle, Notification bell, Profile menu, Password visibility toggles

existing_implementations.description: Found 29 IconButton instances across 15 files. Most have title attributes but NO aria-label. Some examples: Modal close button (Modal.tsx:64), Edit/Delete in data tables (MaterialsPage.tsx:259,262), Theme toggle (ThemeToggle.tsx:34), Notifications and profile menu (Header.tsx:81,87)

accessibility_requirements.solution: Add descriptive aria-label to all IconButton instances
accessibility_requirements.label_guidelines: Use action-oriented labels: 'Close dialog', 'Edit material', 'Delete contact', 'Open notifications', 'Toggle theme', 'Show password', 'Back to projects'
